words.sentence: Ik heb wijn en de scriptie is tricky.
words.sentence_translated: I have wine and the thesis is tricky.

words.sentence: De moeilijkste is de scriptie, want het is tricky.
words.sentence_translated: The most difficult is the thesis because it is tricky.

words.sentence: Wijn maakt de avond kutste, zelfs met een tricky scriptie.
words.sentence_translated: Wine makes the evening the best, even with a tricky thesis.

words.sentence: Ik heb extra wijn voor de kutste avond.
words.sentence_translated: I have extra wine for the best evening.

words.sentence: De scriptie is langer dan ik dacht, en tricky.
words.sentence_translated: The thesis is longer than I thought, and tricky.

words.sentence: Een supergezellige club maakt de avond kutste.
words.sentence_translated: A super cozy club makes the evening the best.
